Package com.greenfabric.system

Interface Summary
OSInfo This interface specifies the services that Operating System specific adapters must implement.
StdOutConsumer Classes that handle output from command-line programs implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
GnuInfo This class contains the knowledge needed to make decisions or detect certain things about the GNU aspects of the environment.
GnuLauncher This class performs the service of executing commands in a GNU environment.
SystemPack This class gives access to implementation classes in the System package.
UnixInfo An implementation of OSInfo for "Unix" operating systems.
WindowsInfo An implementation of OSInfo for "MS Windows" operating systems.
